name: Azure Calculator - Production Environment Variables
description: Recommended environment variables for production deployment on Vercel

NEXT_PUBLIC_API_RATE_LIMIT_REQUESTS.description: Conservative rate limit for production (5 requests per minute)

NEXT_PUBLIC_API_RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW.description: Rate limit window in milliseconds (1 minute)

NEXT_PUBLIC_CACHE_TTL.description: API cache duration in milliseconds (1 hour)

NEXT_PUBLIC_CALCULATION_BATCH_SIZE.description: Conservative batch size for production (1 server per batch)

NEXT_PUBLIC_INDIVIDUAL_CALCULATION_DELAY.description: Delay between calculations in milliseconds (more conservative)

NEXT_PUBLIC_BATCH_BASE_DELAY.description: Base delay between batches in milliseconds (more conservative)

NEXT_PUBLIC_BATCH_DELAY_INCREMENT.description: Delay increment for subsequent batches in milliseconds

NEXT_PUBLIC_BATCH_MAX_DELAY.description: Maximum delay between batches in milliseconds

CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Replace with your actual domain(s), e.g., 'https://yourdomain.com,https://www.yourdomain.com'

instructions: 1. Replace 'REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_DOMAIN' in CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS with your actual domain(s)
2. Adjust rate limiting and batch processing values based on your needs
3. All NEXT_PUBLIC_* variables will be exposed to the browser
4. CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS is server-side only and critical for security
